components.label: HTML
components.content:
Welcome to your Student Account!

StudentAid BC helps eligible students with the cost of post-secondary education through student loans, grants, and other financial assistance programs. From this page you can:
  • Apply for student financial assistance.
  • View your current and past applications and assessments
  • Track your application status
  • Upload and view documents
  • Request a change to an active application
  • Manage your StudentAid BC profile
  • View your account activity

attrs.value: A person holding a welcome banner. Illustration by Storyset.

components.label: HTML
components.content: Ready to apply? Click below to start your application.

components.label: HTML
components.content: For information about your loan balance, managing your loan, and the repayment of your loan, visit the National Student Loan Service Centre (NSLSC) website.

components.label: HTML
components.content: For more information, visit the StudentAid BC website.

attrs.value: A person with a headset providing support. Illustration by Storyset.
